quadrature module¶

quadrature.block_to_regular(mat)[source]¶

This function converts an sp.Block_Matrix to an sp.Matrix with the same elements

Parameters

mat – sp.Block_Matrix to be converted

Returns

sp.Matrix with the same elements as mat

quadrature.get_weights(j)[source]¶

This function determines the quadrature weights for n-Harmonic splines quadrature using the P_jk basis

Parameters

j – maximum degree of polynomial used for quadrature

Returns

np.array of quadrature weights for the basis {P_01, P_02, P_03, …, P_j2, P_j3}

quadrature.ints_vec(j)[source]¶

This function computes the integrals of {P_01, P_02, P_03, …, P_j2, P_j3}.

Parameters

j – maximum degree of polynomial

Returns

np.array of integrals of {P_01, P_02, P_03, …, P_j2, P_j3}

quadrature.make_big_mat(j)[source]¶

This function creates the block form of the generalized vortex method for interpolation

Parameters

j – maximum degree of polynomial used for quadrature

Returns

sp.Block_Matrix representing the generalized vortex method for interpolation

quadrature.make_block(ind1, ind2)[source]¶

This function is used to generate the blocks in the block-matrix form of the generalized vortex method for interpolation.

Parameters

  • ind2 (ind1,) – block matrix indices in the block form of the

  • vortex method for interpolation (generalized) –

Returns

sp.Matrix block C_ij in the block form of the generalized vortex method for interpolation

quadrature.make_vortex(max_level)[source]¶

This function generates a list of addresses for the vertices chosen for interpolation using the “vortex method.”

Parameters

max_level – integer representing the level of SG used for interpolation

Returns

list of addresses for the vertices chosen for interpolation using the “vortex method.

quadrature.quad_int(func, j)[source]¶

This function calculates the quadrature integral for a given function.

Parameters

  • func – function whose input is the address of a point on SG

  • to the convention in monomials.py) ((according) –

  • j – maximum degree of polynomial used for quadrature

Returns

approximate integral of func

quadrature.vandermonde(j)[source]¶

This function creates the interpolation “Vandermonde” matrix used for determining quadrature weights using up to j-harmonic splines.

Parameters

j – maximum degree of harmonic spline used

Returns

np.array that is the interpolation matrix used for determining quadrature weights using up to j-harmonic splines.
